data.text: @SenTedBuddNC Pass the SAVE America Act!  Invoke the Standing Filibuster!

@SenTedBuddNC We need offsetting cuts, Senator. We need to reduce the debt to prevent our currency becoming worthless. We need to reduce the size and scope of the Federal government. That's why we elected you.

@SenTedBuddNC 👍🇺🇸Please pass the Save America Act 
Thank you

@SenTedBuddNC The American people have been betrayed by those we elected to fight for what we wanted The Save Act. Republicans failed us. Taxation without representation this is what we get. If the ones we elect do not change, all can be primaried out. We are sick and tired. So done!
@SenTedBuddNC See if you can use your pull to actually get NC to pass its own budget?
@SenTedBuddNC So what about the SAVE AMERICA ACT?
@SenTedBuddNC Nothing but THE SAVE ACT, you spineless fraud!!! Signed Pissed Conservative.
